mapper.select: SELECT SUM(O.MILEAGE)+R.MILEAGE FROM RESERVE R JOIN ORDERS O ON R.C_ID = O.C_ID WHERE O.C_ID = #{cId} GROUP BY R.MILEAGE

SELECT NVL(SUM(RE.MILEAGE),0)- NVL(OR1.MILEAGE,0) MILEAGE FROM RESERVE RE , (SELECT S_ID, C_ID, SUM(MILEAGE) MILEAGE FROM ORDERS WHERE C_ID= #{cId} AND S_ID= #{sId} GROUP BY S_ID, C_ID) OR1 WHERE RE.C_ID = #{cId} GROUP BY RE.S_ID, RE.C_ID, OR1.MILEAGE
SELECT TO_CHAR(O_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATES, S.S_NAME, O.MILEAGE FROM RESERVE R JOIN ORDERS O ON R.C_ID = O.C_ID JOIN STORE S ON R.S_ID = S.S_ID WHERE O.C_ID = #{cId}
